title: How to Edit Your Friends List on the Facebook App on Android

steps.title: Open Facebook on your Android.
steps.content: Open Facebook on your Android. It’s the blue icon with a white “f” inside. You’ll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer.

steps.title: Tap the ≡ menu.
steps.content: Tap the ≡ menu. It’s at the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Friends.
steps.content: Tap Friends . This displays your entire friends list. If you don’t see the Friends section, tap Find Friends , and then tap Friends at the top of the page.

steps.title: Tap the Friends button next to the person you want to edit.
steps.content: Tap the Friends button next to the person you want to edit.

steps.title: Tap Edit Friend List.
steps.content: Tap Edit Friend List . This opens a list of your custom friend lists, as well as those generated by Facebook. If you see a blue check mark next to a list’s name, you’ll know the selected person is on that list.

steps.title: Tap a list with a blue check mark to remove this person from the list.
steps.content: Tap a list with a blue check mark to remove this person from the list. The blue check mark will disappear from the selected list.

steps.title: Tap another list’s name to add the friend to that list.
steps.content: Tap another list’s name to add the friend to that list. A blue check mark will then appear next to that list.

steps.title: Tap Done.
steps.content: Tap Done . It’s at the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Open Facebook on your Android.
steps.content: Open Facebook on your Android. It’s the blue icon with a white “f” inside. You’ll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer.

steps.title: Tap the ≡ menu.
steps.content: Tap the ≡ menu. It’s at the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Friends.
steps.content: Tap Friends . This displays your entire friends list. If you don’t see the Friends section, tap Find Friends , and then tap Friends at the top of the page.

steps.title: Tap the Friends button next to the person you want to edit.
steps.content: Tap the Friends button next to the person you want to edit.

steps.title: Tap Unfriend.
steps.content: Tap Unfriend . A confirmation message will appear.

steps.title: Tap Unfriend to confirm.
steps.content: Tap Unfriend to confirm. This person is no longer your Facebook friend.
